person.persName: Melvin Weir (Clark County, Indiana, justice of the peace)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, farmer, soldier, and justice of the peace. Indiana native. Son of John Weir and Eliza McCormick Weir. Married to Mary George Weir. Father of Mary Weir, Anna Weir, John Weir, and Lydia Weir. Resident of Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Clark County in 1860. Magistrate in Clark County in 1863. Quartermaster of the 8th Indiana Legion from September 1, 1863. Justice of the peace in Clark County in 1865.
